Administrative Officer (Youth Corper) Job at Lily Hospitals Limited




        
    

        
        Lily Hospitals Limited, established since 1986, remains one of the foremost hospitals in Nigeria and within the South-South region of the country. It is the first private hospital in Nigeria to achieve ISO 9001:2000 quality management system certification from the Standards Organization of Nigeria (SON) and was also recently accredited with COHSASA (Council for Health Service Accreditation of Southern Africa) Certificate.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Administrative Officer (Youth Corper)

Job Location: Warri, Delta
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary
     

            
    




	Lily College of Nursing Sciences is seeking a dedicated NYSC Corps Member to support its administrative operations.
	The Admin Officer (Corper) will assist with day-to-day office administration, documentation, and coordination of academic and non-academic activities within the College.


Key Responsibilities


	Assist with general administrative and clerical duties
	Support record keeping, filing, and documentation
	Help manage official correspondence and internal communications
	Assist academic and administrative units with routine tasks
	Support meetings, inspections, and college activities
	Perform other administrative duties as assigned.


Requirements


	Must be a serving NYSC Corps Member
	Bachelor’s degree in Business Administration, Public Administration, or a related discipline
	Basic knowledge of Microsoft Office applications
	Good communication and interpersonal skills
	Willingness to learn and ability to work in a team
	High level of professionalism and positive work attitude.


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should submit their CV to: recruitment@lilyhospitals.net using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Content Creator (Fashion Industry)
Job Location: Victoria Island, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

The Role
     

            
    




	We are looking for a creative, tech-forward Content Creator to become the face and the "brain" of our digital presence.
	This isn't a traditional modeling or social media role—you will be leveraging cutting-edge AI tools to streamline production while maintaining a high-fashion, high-impact aesthetic.

	AI Content Strategy: Use Claude AI to draft compelling brand storytelling, captions, and script outlines.
	Visual Design: Create stunning social media graphics and layouts using Canva.

Requirements


	The Ideal Candidate•Tech-Fluent: Proven experience using Claude AI, Canva, and Gamma AI to speed up creative workflows.
	Trend-Obsessed: A deep understanding of the fashion industry and what makes content go viral.
	Articulate: Excellent communication skills, both in writing (AI-assisted) and on camera.

  "description": "Petrogap Oil and Gas Limited was incorporated as a response to the emerging trends in the dynamic Oil &amp; Gas industry. We are a wholly indigenous company and registered player in the Upstream, Midstream and Downstream sectors of the Oil &amp; Gas industry.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Tax &amp; Audit Officer&nbsp;

Job Location:&nbsp;Victoria Island, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	Are you a detail-oriented professional with strong tax expertise and a passion for financial accuracy?
	We are seeking an experienced Tax &amp; Audit Accountant to join our team and ensure full compliance with tax regulations while optimizing tax processes and efficiency.


Key Responsibilities


	Prepare, review, and file monthly, quarterly, and annual tax returns (CIT, VAT, WHT, PAYE, etc.)
	Ensure full compliance with tax laws and stay updated on regulatory changes
	Liaise with tax authorities and manage tax audits, reconciliations, and investigations
	Maintain accurate tax records and documentation
	Advise management on tax planning strategies to minimize liabilities legally.
	Support financial reporting with accurate tax entries and analysis.


Requirements &amp; Qualifications


	Minimum of a 2:2 Bachelor&rsquo;s Degree in Accounting, Finance, or related discipline.
	2&ndash;3 years of experience as a Tax and Audit Accountant (preferably in the oil servicing industry)
	Professional certification: ICAN or ACCA is required.
	Strong knowledge of Nigerian tax laws and processes (FIRS/LIRS)
	Proficiency in accounting software (e.g., Sage, SAP, QuickBooks)
	Excellent analytical, communication, and documentation skills.


Method of Application&nbsp;

Tax & Audit Officer Job at Petrogap Oil and Gas Limited




        
    

        
        Petrogap Oil and Gas Limited was incorporated as a response to the emerging trends in the dynamic Oil & Gas industry. We are a wholly indigenous company and registered player in the Upstream, Midstream and Downstream sectors of the Oil & Gas industry.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Tax & Audit Officer 

Job Location: Victoria Island, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary
     

            
    




	Are you a detail-oriented professional with strong tax expertise and a passion for financial accuracy?
	We are seeking an experienced Tax & Audit Accountant to join our team and ensure full compliance with tax regulations while optimizing tax processes and efficiency.


Key Responsibilities


	Prepare, review, and file monthly, quarterly, and annual tax returns (CIT, VAT, WHT, PAYE, etc.)
	Ensure full compliance with tax laws and stay updated on regulatory changes
	Liaise with tax authorities and manage tax audits, reconciliations, and investigations
	Maintain accurate tax records and documentation
	Advise management on tax planning strategies to minimize liabilities legally.
	Support financial reporting with accurate tax entries and analysis.


Requirements & Qualifications


	Minimum of a 2:2 Bachelor’s Degree in Accounting, Finance, or related discipline.
	2–3 years of experience as a Tax and Audit Accountant (preferably in the oil servicing industry)
	Professional certification: ICAN or ACCA is required.
	Strong knowledge of Nigerian tax laws and processes (FIRS/LIRS)
	Proficiency in accounting software (e.g., Sage, SAP, QuickBooks)
	Excellent analytical, communication, and documentation skills.


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: talentconnect.ng@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

Operations Manager Job at Lamlan Digital Solutions Limited




        
    

        
        Lamlan Digital Solutions Limited is a Global Top-Rated full-scale Digital Marketing & Social Media Management Company with offices in Nigeria, Kenya, Canada, Qatar and Ghana.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Operations Manager
Job Location: Lekki Ajah - Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary
     

            
    




	As part of our strategic transformation, we are seeking a highly capable Operations Manager to oversee the company’s operations, manage teams effectively, and drive sustainable growth.
	The Operations Manager will provide strategic and operational leadership across all business functions of Lamlan Digital Solutions, Nigeria.
	This includes responsibility for business development, client service delivery, operational efficiency, and people management.
	The operations manger will work closely with the executive team to reposition the agency for growth, strengthen internal systems, and ensure excellence in all deliverables.


Key Responsibilities


	Provide overall leadership and direction for the company, ensuring alignment with strategic objectives.
	Oversee day-to-day operations across different teams, ensuring efficiency, speed, quality, and profitability.
	Manage and motivate teams, fostering a culture of accountability, innovation, and performance excellence.
	Implement effective business structures, processes, and standard operating procedures.
	Drive revenue growth through new business development, client acquisition, and retention strategies.
	Ensure high-quality client service delivery and build long-term client relationships.
	Oversee financial performance, including budgeting, cost control, and reporting.
	Monitor industry trends and competitor activities to guide business strategy.
	Prepare and present regular performance reports to the Management.


Qualifications and Experience


	Bachelor’s Degree in Business Administration, (Digital) Marketing, Communications, or a related field.
	Minimum of 3 years of progressive leadership experience in a digital agency, communications or marketing environment.
	A postgraduate Degree (MBA) will be an added advantage.
	Proven track record of managing teams and driving business growth.
	Combined strongknowledge of social media management, digital marketing, business development and sales strategy
	Excellent leadership, interpersonal, and people management skills.
	Strong organizational, decision-making, and problem-solving abilities.


Benefits


	A suitable working environment with other intelligent creators and smart tech individuals.
	Available Accomodation
	frequent bonus based on performance
	A good and latest laptop and phone to aid your work.
	Great % of bonus on every deal directly faciliated by you.
	You never work on your birthday
	Super fast StarLink internet access.
	Annnual leave
	International travel opportunities to other Lamlan branches


Note


	Candidates are advised to use the "Sell yourself" box on the application page tohighlight their relevant experience and achievements,clearly outlining their suitability for the role, leadership experience, and vision for managing and growing Lamlan Digital Solutions.
